question: when did teenage mutant ninja turtles come out
vanilla_rag_result: The "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" animated series aired on Nickelodeon in the United States from September 29, 2012, to November 12, 2017. Additionally, the original Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles comic book characters were created in 1983. The franchise has seen various adaptations and releases over the years, including video games and merchandise.
